name: Next-Level Nourishment Signature Hair Routine Set
about: What it is:A set that unlocks next-level hair joy, featuring full sizes of Normcore Signature Shampoo and Conditioner, plus Soulfood Nourishing Mask..Hair Texture:Straight and Wavy.Hair Type:Fine and Medium.Hair Concerns:- Dryness.Key Benefits:- Nourishes all hair types.Highlighted Ingredients:- Jojoba Seed oil: Contains powerful antioxidants and is rich in vitamins A, D, and E..Ingredient Callouts:These products are vegan, cruelty-free, and come in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:Take their hair to the next level with nourishing, superfruit sea buckthorn favorites for hair that's up to seven times more conditioned. This limited-edition gift set features full sizes of Normcore Signature Shampoo and Conditioner and Soulfood Nourishing Mask. Send them home with season’s greetings and daily nourishment..Fragrance Description:A blend of warm vanilla, spicy sweet clover, and fresh citrus...Clinical Results:Normcore Signature Shampoo and Conditioner: In a clinical test, when using shampoo and conditioner as a system:.This Set Contains:- 9.2 oz/ 275 mL Normcore Signature Shampoo (full size).Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Normcore Signature Shampoo and Conditioner: .-Massage through wet hair. .-Rinse...Soulfood Nourishing Mask:.-Massage through wet hair. .-Let penetrate for five to seven minutes.  .-Rinse well.  .-Use weekly or daily...Recycling Instructions:.-TerraCycle® and amika joined forces to create a free national recycling program for amika’s hair care packaging..-Save your empties, print a free shipping label, and send back your packaging to give it a new life. Learn more and sign up at terracycle.com/en-US/brigades/amika.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am in shock of how much better my hair is and need more

reviews.review_title: Scent is chefs kiss, makes my hair fall out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine wavy hair that is colour treated. At first, I was thrilled because the smell is just AMAZING and lasts all day! Then my hair started falling out. I now have bald patches where I once had gorgeous thick hair. I switched to Garnier strength shampoo and the hair fall stopped. I will NEVER BUY expensive hair care again. Beware for the colour treated girlies!!
